entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 9.
